channel.title: (FIXED)NPC Teleport HELP!(FIXED)
channel.description: hey,i finished my dungeoneering stuff and now im making this special minigame, my goal is to make 5 or 6 levels to it. the point is you kill 1 boss then he teles you to another bigger boss,once the minigame is finished it teles you to a chest where the player clicks on the chest and gets a random reward but right when he clicks on the chest and gets it, he automaticaly gets teledd back home. how can i make it so when you kill an npc, it would tele the player to the next boss stage and so this chest gives the player a reward then teles him home? (im using rune-evo 742)

item.title: (FIXED)NPC Teleport HELP!(FIXED)
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:32, topic:513403”][quote author=gimpie link=topic=631649.msg4275341#msg4275341 date=1364898979]
no i have the required varible for killer its used for meh dung xp, and beleive it or not i dont have a player assistant im using rune evo 742
[/quote]
Lol dude I was helping you thinking this was 317. So. Yeah. I dunno.[/quote]
Thanks for the help anyway bro Im still struggiling to find it

Read full topic

item.title: (FIXED)NPC Teleport HELP!(FIXED)
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote author=gimpie link=topic=631649.msg4275325#msg4275325 date=1364897312]

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=631649.msg4275316#msg4275316 date=1364896709]

[quote author=gimpie link=topic=631649.msg4275313#msg4275313 date=1364896386]

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:25, topic:513403”]No, you can’t change killer as that’s the client (player).
and I just said why you can’t do getPA.
the only thing you could replace is movePlayer.
i know i cant replace killer, i mean id have to replace both pa and moveplayer
i still get an error starting... src\com\rs\game\npc\NPC.java:834: error: cannot find symbol killer.getPA().startTeleport(5555, 5555, 0, "modern"); ^ symbol: method getPA() location: variable killer of type Player Note: src\com\rs\content\exchange\GrandExchange.java uses unchecked or unsafe op erations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Finished Press any key to continue . . .

Theres gotta be another directory then PA
The only thing you can replace is move player:
killer.getPA().startTeleport(X,Y,Z, “modern”);[/quote]

sk8rdude461:

Import playerassistant?

I Think he doesnt have the required variable for killer…

Read full topic

item.title: (FIXED)NPC Teleport HELP!(FIXED)
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=631649.msg4275316#msg4275316 date=1364896709]

[quote author=gimpie link=topic=631649.msg4275313#msg4275313 date=1364896386]

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=631649.msg4275311#msg4275311 date=1364896148]
No, you can’t change killer as that’s the client (player).
and I just said why you can’t do getPA.
the only thing you could replace is movePlayer.
i know i cant replace killer, i mean id have to replace both pa and moveplayer
i still get an error starting... src\com\rs\game\npc\NPC.java:834: error: cannot find symbol killer.getPA().startTeleport(5555, 5555, 0, "modern"); ^ symbol: method getPA() location: variable killer of type Player Note: src\com\rs\content\exchange\GrandExchange.java uses unchecked or unsafe op erations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Finished Press any key to continue . . .

Theres gotta be another directory then PA
The only thing you can replace is move player:
killer.getPA().startTeleport(X,Y,Z, “modern”);

item.title: (FIXED)NPC Teleport HELP!(FIXED)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“gimpie, post:26, topic:513403”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=631649.msg4275311#msg4275311 date=1364896148]
No, you can’t change killer as that’s the client (player).
and I just said why you can’t do getPA.
the only thing you could replace is movePlayer.
[/quote]
i know i cant replace killer, i mean id have to replace both pa and moveplayer[/quote]
The only thing you can replace is move player:
killer.getPA().startTeleport(X,Y,Z, “modern”);

item.title: (FIXED)NPC Teleport HELP!(FIXED)
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:23, topic:513403”][quote author=gimpie link=topic=631649.msg4275267#msg4275267 date=1364894806]

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=631649.msg4275266#msg4275266 date=1364894388]

[quote author=gimpie link=topic=631649.msg4275262#msg4275262 date=1364894059]

Even if i could add something inbetween the Killer return line and the one above it } else { if (this.getId() == 10141) { killer.getSkills().addXp(Skills.DUNGEONEERING, 100000); killer.getInventory().addItem(620, 500); if (killer == null) return; thats when the player kills the npc could i possibly add a line inbetween there somwhere that could tele the player?

Wel… Theoretically, yes. But that’d only work for the one NPC.
[/quote] yes its only for the one npc, theres about 8 more npcs above these lines and theve got nothing to do with the minigame however i could just cop/paste it beleow return; and add } else { above it to create a new line for an npc (thats how i managed to make all my Dung npcs give me dung exp)

That doesn’t sound very efficient…
[/quote] its ok its not that great, anyway all i need is a line to put inbetween there thats where im stuck i gota add something like killer.getworldtile… or someshit. ive tried many methods and i cant get one. can any1 help me out?

why not just:
killer.getPA().movePlayer(X,Y,Z);
[/quote] Thanks but when i compile it i still get an error could i replace pa to something?

Well, no, getPA() is where movePlayer is found…[/quote] well obviously, i mean replace them both i just dont know what

Read full topic

Even if i could add something inbetween the Killer return line and the one above it } else { if (this.getId() == 10141) { killer.getSkills().addXp(Skills.DUNGEONEERING, 100000); killer.getInventory().addItem(620, 500); if (killer == null) return; thats when the player kills the npc could i possibly add a line inbetween there somwhere that could tele the player?

Wel… Theoretically, yes. But that’d only work for the one NPC.
[/quote] yes its only for the one npc, theres about 8 more npcs above these lines and theve got nothing to do with the minigame however i could just cop/paste it beleow return; and add } else { above it to create a new line for an npc (thats how i managed to make all my Dung npcs give me dung exp)

That doesn’t sound very efficient…
[/quote] its ok its not that great, anyway all i need is a line to put inbetween there thats where im stuck i gota add something like killer.getworldtile… or someshit. ive tried many methods and i cant get one. can any1 help me out?

why not just:
killer.getPA().movePlayer(X,Y,Z);
[/quote] Thanks but when i compile it i still get an error could i replace pa to something?[/quote]
Well, no, getPA() is where movePlayer is found…

item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

xXSh0ckXx:

post the error :] i just code PI’s but i will give it a try helping you

ok thanks heres my npc i have set to give me exp and dung tokens } else { if (this.getId() == 10141) { killer.getSkills().addXp(Skills.DUNGEONEERING, 100000); killer.getInventory().addItem(620, 500); if (killer == null) return; my goal is once the npc is dead i want the player to be automaticaly teleported to another npc room with another boss (repeat for about 6 stages, this npc is gonna be me last boss but im just using him to test this out) i have to add “killer.get…” inbetween getinventory and “if killer null” the problem is i cant seem to figure out what that killer.get should be so once the npcs dead the player is telported to a new boss
